feed.subtitle: Computational chemist. Personal blog for code and science.

entry.title: Run Molecular Dynamics Simulation on Container and AWS Batch

link.title: Run Molecular Dynamics Simulation on Container and AWS Batch

entry.summary: AWS and other cloud platform offers flexible computing resources at a reasonable price. There are many ways to take advantage of such cloud resource. In the last post, I examined running MD simulation using AWS Parallel Cluster. Here, I’m going to show you how to run MD simulation using AWS Batch

entry.title: Run Molecular Dynamics Simulation on AWS Cluster

link.title: Run Molecular Dynamics Simulation on AWS Cluster

entry.summary: AWS and other cloud platform offers flexible computing resources at a reasonable price. There are many ways to take advantage of such cloud resource. Here, I’m going to show you how to setup a traditional cluster on AWS using parallel-cluster and perform MD simulation on it.
